#summary Toolchain installation overview.

= Introduction =

 This chapter describes how to setup necessary tools which you will need to develop Embox.
 This section is in no way trying to impose on you the proposed tools, you are free to enjoy a more comfortable and familiar (e.g. *Emacs* or *Vim*).

= Contents =

 == [InstallToolchainWindowsCygwin Windows-specific setup] ==
  Windows user have to perform some additional steps to get things work. This article covers the installation procedure of *Cygwin* Unix-compatibility layer.

 == [InstallToolchainPath PATH environment variable] ==
  Describes how to set *`PATH`* environment variable in both Windows and Linux systems.

 == [InstallToolchainEclipse Eclipse] ==
  Installing and tweaking *Eclipse IDE* with *CDT* plugin.

 == [InstallToolchainSubversion Subversion] ==
  Installing *Subclipse* SVN plugin for Eclipse and checking out Embox from the repository.

 == [InstallMybuildEclipsePlugin Mybuild] ==
  Installing *Mybuild* plugin for Eclipse.
